sense.gloss: to freeze (of one's body), to be frozen, to become numb (with cold), to be chilled

sdata.j: この↑部屋↑↓へや↓は|↑凍↑↓こご↓える|よ、シンディー。この↑寒↑↓さむ↓さはたえられないよ。
sdata.e: It's freezing in this room, Cindy. I can't put up with this cold.

sdata.j: ↑試合↑↓しあい↓は|↑凍↑↓こご↓える|ような↑天候↑↓てんこう↓のため↑中止↑↓ちゅうし↓されなければならなかった。
sdata.e: The match had to be called off because of the freezing weather.
